text: Pterolophosoma otiliae is an extinct species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae, and the only species in the genus Pterolophosoma. It was described by Vitali in 2006 who founded it in a Dominican amber dating to Early Miocene. ==References== Category:Desmiphorini Category:Prehistoric beetles Category:Beetles of North America Category:Burdigalian life Category:Neogene Dominican Republic Category:Miocene insects of North America Category:Fossil insects of the Caribbean Category:Fauna of Hispaniola Category:Insects of the Dominican Republic Category:Fossils of the Dominican Republic Category:Dominican amber Category:Beetles described in 2006 Category:Monotypic beetle genera
title: Pterolophosoma
